com.ooyala.android
Interface Movie

All Known Subinterfaces:
Channel, ChannelSet
public interface Movie

Stores the info and metatdata for the specified movie.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getDescription()
          Get the description for this movie
 java.lang.String getEmbedCode()
          Get the embedCode for this movie.
 java.lang.String getPromoImageURL(int width, int height)
          Returns a promo image URL for this movie that will be at least the specified dimensions
 java.lang.String getPromoImageURL(java.lang.String embedCode, int width, int height)
          Returns a promo image URL for the given embed code in a channel that will be at least the specified dimensions, or null for an embed code not present in the channel.
 java.lang.String getTitle()
          Get the title for this movie
 float getTotalTime()
          Get the length of the movie (in seconds with millisecond accuracy)
 boolean isAd()
          Returns whether this movie is an ad
